name: part_001
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】かなたそとっ♡神曲アニソンFes!! ⧸ Amane Kanata AnimeSong 3DLIVE 【#天音かなた爆誕2024 ⧸ ホロライブ】 [lVQlIvUr5Dc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: MC section. Kanata greets the audience, mentions the hashtag, and introduces 'Uppao' (her axolotl fans).
Transition to the next song. Kanata introduces Shiranui Flare as a guest.
Performance of the song 'only my railgun' with Shiranui Flare.

subtitles.original: ...believe...
subtitles.english: ...believe...

subtitles.original: revive a soul
subtitles.english: revive a soul

subtitles.original: ハイ！みなさんこんかなたー！
subtitles.english: Hi! Everyone, Kon-Kanata!

subtitles.original: かなたそとっ♡神曲アニソンFes!! ようこそいらっしゃいましたー！
subtitles.english: Welcome to Kanata-soto♡ Kami-kyoku Anisong Fes!!

subtitles.original: イエーイ、ありがとう！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Yay, thank you! Thank you!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、ハッシュタグは #天音かなた爆誕2024 で、いっぱい呟いてくださーい！
subtitles.english: Alright! So, please tweet a lot with the hashtag #AmaneKanataBirthday2024!

subtitles.original: 頑張るぞ、頑張るぞ、
subtitles.english: I'll do my best, I'll do my best,

subtitles.original: みんなも頑張ってね。いっぱい呟いてね。
subtitles.english: everyone do your best too. Tweet a lot, okay?

subtitles.original: ということで、本日お客さん入ってます。ドドーン！ウッパオだー！
subtitles.english: So, we have guests today. Ta-da! It's the Uppao!

subtitles.original: みなさん知ってますか？ウッパオという存在を。
subtitles.english: Do you all know? About the existence of Uppao.

subtitles.original: 平民じゃなきゃね、ちょっと認知度が低く、あんまりグッズも売れてないんですけれども。
subtitles.english: If you're not a Heimin, their recognition is a bit low, and their goods aren't selling that well either...

subtitles.original: そんなこと言ったらみんなに愛されるキャラになりました！よかったね、ウッパオ。
subtitles.english: But having said that, they've become characters loved by everyone! Good for you, Uppao.

subtitles.original: ウッパ役もやっていきつつ、えー、本日頑張っていこうと思います。
subtitles.english: While also playing the role of Uppa, I'll do my best today.

subtitles.original: たくさんのウッパオに囲まれて歌っていきます。
subtitles.english: I'll be singing surrounded by many Uppao.

subtitles.original: それでは早速、次の曲参りましょう。いくぞー！
subtitles.english: Now then, let's move on to the next song right away. Let's go!

subtitles.original: みんなー！もっともっと盛り上がれますかー！？
subtitles.english: Everyone! Can you get even more hyped!?

subtitles.original: 早速、もうゲストが登場します！トップバッターは不知火フレア！
subtitles.english: Right away, a guest is appearing! The first batter is Shiranui Flare!

subtitles.original: 放て！心に刻んだ夢を
subtitles.english: Unleash! The dream engraved in my heart

subtitles.original: 未来さえ置き去りにして
subtitles.english: Leaving even the future behind

subtitles.original: 限界など知らない 意味無い
subtitles.english: Knowing no limits, it's meaningless

subtitles.original: この力が光散らす
subtitles.english: This power scatters the light

subtitles.original: その先に遥かな想いを
subtitles.english: Sending my distant feelings beyond it

subtitles.original: 歩いてきたこの道を
subtitles.english: This path that I've walked down,

subtitles.original: 振り返ることしか
subtitles.english: if all I can do

subtitles.original: 出来ないなら 今ここで
subtitles.english: is look back, then right here and now,

subtitles.original: 全てを壊せる
subtitles.english: I can destroy everything

subtitles.original: 暗闇に落ちる街並み
subtitles.english: The cityscape falling into darkness,

subtitles.original: 人はどこまで立ち向かえるの？
subtitles.english: how far can people stand against it?

subtitles.original: 加速するその痛みから
subtitles.english: From that accelerating pain,

subtitles.original: 誰かをきっと守れるよ
subtitles.english: I can surely protect someone

subtitles.original: Looking! The blitz loop this planet to search-way only my RAILGUN
subtitles.english: Looking! The blitz loop this planet to search-way only my RAILGUN

subtitles.original: 今すぐ 身体中を光の速さで
subtitles.english: Right now, through my whole body at the speed of light,

subtitles.original: 駆け巡った確かな予感
subtitles.english: a certain premonition raced through me

subtitles.original: 掴め！望むものなら残さず
subtitles.english: Seize it! If it's what you want, leave nothing behind

subtitles.original: 輝ける自分らしさで
subtitles.english: with a radiance that is true to yourself

subtitles.original: 信じてるよあの日の誓いを
subtitles.english: I believe in the vow of that day

subtitles.original: この瞳に光る涙
subtitles.english: The tears shining in these eyes

subtitles.original: それさえも強さになるから
subtitles.english: even they will become my strength

subtitles.original: 立ち止まると 少しだけ
subtitles.english: When I stop for a moment,

subtitles.original: 感じる切なさに
subtitles.english: the sadness that I feel,

subtitles.original: 戸惑う事無いなんて
subtitles.english: I won't lie and say

subtitles.original: 嘘はつかないよ
subtitles.english: it doesn't bewilder me

subtitles.original: 空に舞うコインが描く
subtitles.english: The trajectory of the coin dancing in the sky

subtitles.original: 放物線が決める運命
subtitles.english: is the parabola that decides my fate

subtitles.original: 打ち出した答えが今日も
subtitles.english: The answer I've sent out today,

subtitles.original: 私の胸を駆け巡る
subtitles.english: too, is racing through my chest

subtitles.original: Sparking! The shiny lights awake true desire only my RAILGUN
subtitles.english: Sparking! The shiny lights awake true desire only my RAILGUN

subtitles.original: 必ず 貫いてく 戸惑うことなく
subtitles.english: I will surely pierce through, without any hesitation

subtitles.original: 傷ついても 走り続ける
subtitles.english: Even if I get hurt, I'll keep on running

subtitles.original: 凛と煌めく視線は
subtitles.english: My dignified and sparkling gaze

subtitles.original: 狂いなく闇を切り裂く
subtitles.english: cuts through the darkness without error

subtitles.original: 迷いなんて吹き飛ばせばいい
subtitles.english: I should just blow away any doubts

subtitles.original: この心が叫ぶ限り
subtitles.english: as long as this heart of mine screams out

subtitles.original: 誰ひとり邪魔などさせない
subtitles.english: I won't let a single person get in my way

subtitles.original: 儚く舞う無数の願いは
subtitles.english: The countless fleetingly dancing wishes

subtitles.original: この両手に積もってゆく
subtitles.english: accumulate in these hands of mine

subtitles.original: 切り裂く闇に見えてくるのは...
subtitles.english: What becomes visible in the piercing darkness...
